definition: one's physique (tall or short, thin or fat)/stature

sentences.english: The knot is a dumpy, short-legged, wading bird.
sentences.chinese: 濱鷸是一種矮胖的短腳涉禽。

sentences.english: He pointed to the baker, the pudgy Nazorine.
sentences.chinese: 他指向麪包師，矮胖的納佐林。

sentences.english: He should be stocky, not long-legged or racy in outline.
sentences.chinese: 其輪廓比較矮胖，不能長着長腿。

sentences.english: He went on leisurely writing, until after a time a short, stout gentleman came in from the street.
sentences.chinese: 過了一會兒，一個矮矮胖胖的先生從街上走了進來。

sentences.english: I’m a little teapot, short and stout.
sentences.chinese: 我是一把小茶壺，矮矮胖胖。

sentences.english: We stopped the pudgy kid in the middle of the sidewalk and surrounded him.
sentences.chinese: 我們在人行道中間攔住了那個矮胖小子。

sentences.english: A soldier of dumpy scholar shape say.
sentences.chinese: 一個矮胖的書生模樣的士兵說道。

sentences.english: In fact, mutant mice that have no circadian clocks tend to be chunky.
sentences.chinese: 比如無生物鐘的變種小鼠身形就趨於矮胖。

sentences.english: Did you see a five-by-five man in the park that day?
sentences.chinese: 那天你在公園裏是否看見一個長得矮胖的男人？

sentences.english: The cream-furred Ebe is a rotund humanoid of small stature.
sentences.chinese: 乳黃色皮毛的埃貝是個身材矮胖的人形生物。

sentences.english: A short plump woman came waddling along the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 有個矮胖女子一搖一擺地沿人行道走來。

sentences.english: All of horses and all of the men couldn't put Humpty Dumpty together again.
sentences.chinese: 所有馬和那些人都能再次一同放矮胖的人。

sentences.english: Metroplex is very stocky looking and looks armored to the hilt.
sentences.chinese: 大都市是非常矮胖的體形，看起來像披甲的刀把。

sentences.english: Chunky stripe pattern for an eye-catching look.
sentences.chinese: 一個醒目的外觀矮胖的條紋圖案。

sentences.english: Humpty Dumpty sits on his wall.

definition: a person of short stature/a short person
back of a tiger and waist of a bear/tough and stocky build
robust and prosperous (a compliment in former times)/fat person (modern)
